GlobalValueSet.description:
Status field picklist value set, used for Therapy Status fields.
Pending: Status assigned to a patient's care plan confirming they are going through the program enrollment process (new or restart patient).
On Therapy: Status assigned to a patient's care plan confirming they are fully approved for dispense and awaiting/currently receiving shipments.
Treatment Complete: Status assigned to a patient's care plan confirming they have completed their treatment journey.
Discontinued: Status assigned to a patient's care plan confirming they have previously enrolled in a program, but have either chosen or have been deemed ineligible to continue.
Cancelled: Status assigned to a patient's care plan confirming they have either chosen not to continue with enrollment, or have been deemed ineligible to continue.
